column6: 2 . 5 x uln obtained within 28 days prior to registration patients may be on lipid lowering agents to reach these values

column4: serum cholesterol = < 300 mg / dl or = < 7 . 75 mmol / l and fasting
column6: 2 . 5 x upper limit of normal uln note in case one or both of these thresholds are exceeded the patient can receive everolimus on study only after initiation of appropriate lipid lowering medication with follow up documentation of values below the above cut off

column2: within less than or equal to 14 days prior to registration
column4: serum glucose = < 130 mg / dl and fasting
